imdb.title: Sôsei no Aquarion
imdb.plot: Humanity is dominated by fear when the Shadow Angels invade after 12,000 years of slumber. There is hope, however - Mechanical Angel Aquarion, a fighting machine powered by the intertwined souls of pilots known as Elements.

episodes.title: The Wings of Betrayal
episodes.plot: In a distant future there is an organization called Deava which had to fight against the so called "Shadow Angels", creatures that had survived for over 12,000 years whose only purpose was to destroy humanity. Apollo, a seemingly normal human, was in fact the reincarnation of a fallen Angel called Apollonius, who in turn had to fight against Touma, a Shadow Angel, along with his comrades in order to prevent the destruction of the Earth.

episodes.title: The Wings of Glory
episodes.plot: Long ago, at time when Heaven and Earth were one, the world was filled with beauty and the Angels sang to the stars. However the only source of fear were those Angels that hunted humans. The humans raised the flag of rebellion and fought back, beginning the long war. In the midst of the war, Apollonius, a slaughtering Angel, met a girl named Celine and fell in love at first sight. Casting aside his wings, Apollonius joined Celine and the humans, and helped them create the mecha warriors that gave humanity a chance of winning the war. Angry at the loss of his 'love', ...

episodes.title: Genesis of Aquarion Love / Sousei no Aquarion Evol
episodes.plot: Sousei no Aquarion Evol is set in the spring of 1966. Shin Tsukishima, who is travelling to get a crystal radio, meets Yuno Kawazu, a girl crying on a beach in Izu. Shin and Yuno are guided by the Book of Genesis and meet each other halfway. The boundaries between three worlds begin to distort.

episodes.title: Ah! Days of Our Youth
episodes.plot: Out of date phrases and unpopular words make a sudden resurgence in Asagaya, and Sakurako suspects multiple M.J.B.K.s are to blame! Will her Yurei busting plan restore verbal order or will it like majorly fail?

episodes.title: Carve Them In! The Scars of Destiny
episodes.plot: In the early days of the internet, Sougon and his partner Mao Hayashi built what would become the greatest networking company in Japan: Nesta. In their quest to reach the next level of human communication, they also took in a young boy��_

episodes.title: Memories of an Angel
episodes.plot: When the Shadow Angels invade after 12,000 years of slumber, one young man - Apollo - could be the prophesized missing piece that finally completes Aquarion.

episodes.title: The Beast of Darkness
episodes.plot: The Elements lose their edge, their souls unraveling in battle. Aquarion is torn asunder and the situation looks grim - until Apollo joins the fight!

episodes.title: Element School
episodes.plot: Apollo reports for duty with the new Elements, making some of the more experienced pilots touchy. When an alien harvesting team appears in the city, veteran and rookie alike are pushed to the limits.

episodes.title: Barefoot Soldiers
episodes.plot: The recruits undergo a strange training exercise at the will of Gen Fudo, their new commander. Paying attention to the odd lesson could mean surviving versus perishing.

episodes.title: King of the Underground Labyrinth
episodes.plot: Apollo goes AWOL and the team is sent out to find him. His motivations for vanishing are personal, and his vendetta puts the whole team at risk.

episodes.title: To the Other Side of Emotions
episodes.plot: Apollo and the other recruits begin work on their telekinetic abilities, enhancing the powers of their imaginations and spirits. The new techniques create a connection easily transferred into fighting strategy.

episodes.title: Knight of the Crimson Rose
episodes.plot: As the pressure for perfect unity mounts, the recruits' feelings are getting ragged. If victory is to be assured, the Vector pilots must embrace their darkness. Only in their weakness will true strength be found.

episodes.title: The First Merge
episodes.plot: When you're one of the few recruits that haven't experienced a merge, it's easy to get the wrong idea about it. If you get too excited, things can get explosive.

episodes.title: The Path to Dreams
episodes.plot: A Harvest Beast has opened the door to human dreams and the Shadow Angels seem to be plucking children from their sleep. The fighters take an amazing risk to save them.

episodes.title: Stars in the Sky, Flowers on the Ground
episodes.plot: The Shadow Angels unleash a dreadful new weapon, designed to be guided by their most powerful warrior. Elements are seriously injured and must heal while the Vectors are repaired in the field.

episodes.title: Happiness Is at the Bottom of the Lake
episodes.plot: A crisis of confidence has shaken Reika to the core, forcing the depressed pilot to leave the program and her partners behind.

episodes.title: The Time of Amber
episodes.plot: An artifact from a holy scripture unleashes a flood of recollection, igniting the souls of Apollo and Silvia. Toma himself visits the Earth in a war machine - and Apollo is in the crosshairs.

episodes.title: A 12,000 Year-Old Love Letter
episodes.plot: Apollo may be a beast, but Toma knows his weakness: the loyalty that will allow the Shadow Angel access to the relic.

episodes.title: Shining Shadows
episodes.plot: The Shadow Angels are depending on the Solar Wing to deliver them unto a new world - but who is the true Solar Wing? Silvia struggles to make sense of past lives and present frustrations.

episodes.title: Aquarion's First Love
episodes.plot: Pierre has grown addicted to merging, and there's a real chance his mind will slip into madness if he ever does it again. When the Shadow Angels attack his hometown, Pierre must choose his fate.

episodes.title: Black Mirror
episodes.plot: The recruits grow uneasy when one among them is suspected of being a vampire. As rumors float through the base, mysterious sicknesses and strange encounters within the team have Silvia intrigued.

episodes.title: Merge to Eat
episodes.plot: The Shadow Angels are disgusted by the gluttonous dreams of humanity. Exploiting the ultimate weakness as punishment, the Earth's food supply begins to vanish and the populace is soon starving.

episodes.title: Cosplay of the Soul
episodes.plot: To become intimately familiar with their partners, the Aquarion recruits are commanded to dress and act like their counterparts. Some will have their feelings hurt before the lessons of the exercise become clear.

episodes.title: Mischief Without Malice
episodes.plot: As the pilots wander in a strange land of twisted dreams, Aquarion lays broken - and Apollo and the others struggle to stay sane.

episodes.title: Sound of an Angel's Feather
episodes.plot: A young Shadow Angel is captured and the creature is poked and prodded in a cold laboratory. The horrible result of the torture leaves two species boiling in anger

episodes.title: Crimson Path
episodes.plot: The Shadow Angels lust for revenge after the loss of one of their own. The line between good and evil begins to blur as secrets are revealed and bonds tested.

episodes.title: Wings Which Cannot Be Seen
episodes.plot: Ex-comrades meet on the battlegrounds of a new war. Element will fight Element, the dead will rise to fight their own, and the true Solar Wing will be revealed!

episodes.title: Wings, Far Away
episodes.plot: A next generation Aquarion appears and joins the fight, piloted by a victim of the unending war. As tradition and dreams clash, one girl takes a stand.

episodes.title: Gates of Heaven
episodes.plot: The Shadow Angels have gained the upper hand now that Sirius has joined them. Apollo must open the gates to Heaven and undertake a dangerous rescue mission - though it may already be too late.

episodes.title: Final Battle!! Atlantis
episodes.plot: The remaining members of the Aquarion team have broken through to Atlandia! Sirius and Apollo meet in combat, heading toward their final destiny.

episodes.title: The Day the World Began
episodes.plot: The secrets of the Solar Wing have been revealed, and Aquarion may be forced to make the final sacrifice in order to save the souls of every sentient being.
